# patternInput

**Instance Property**

The input object for a pattern gear shift.

## Declaration

```swift
var patternInput: (any GCSwitchPositionInput)? { get }
```

## Discussion

If this property is `nil`, the gear shift isn’t a pattern gear shift. A pattern gear shift lays out the gears in a pattern that lets the user move to any gear. If the [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCSwitchPositionInput/position] property of this property is `0`, the gear shift is in neutral. If it’s `-1`, the gear shift is in reverse.

## Accessing input values

- **sequentialInput**: The input object for a sequential gear shift.
